title: Filter Authoring Info for building scene layer
description: The filter authoring info object contains metadata about the authoring process for creating a filter object. This allows the authoring client to save specific, overridable settings.  The next time it is accessed with an authoring client, the selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it.

enum-description.checkbox: Client UI with checkbox representation for each filter type and filter value.

type.description: Declares type or filter authoring info.

filterblocks.description: Array of filter block authoring info.
